function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Absence of specific treatment or vaccine for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher risk of severe illness for older adults and those with existing medical conditions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of covid-19 through respiratory droplets","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 via unsymptomatic individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survival of covid-19 virus on surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preventive measures for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale research and development efforts for vaccines and treatments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate clinical understanding of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studying patients with covid-19, including those with a direct link to the epicenter, poses a risk of exposure to the virus for the researchers.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reviewing a small subset of literature on covid-19 may lead to incomplete understanding of the disease and its characteristics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive review of the covid-19 outbreak and its potential implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No work in the existing literature reviewing the role of emerging technologies in managing the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical pandemics and their impact on humankind","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of disease from birds to humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of young and healthy individuals to h1n1 virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continued evolution and mutation of influenza viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of new strains of influenza virus leading to pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with distinct stages of transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sporadic cases of covid-19 leading to local transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clusters of covid-19 cases with unknown transmission source","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community transmission leading to large outbreaks and high number of incidents and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid outbreak of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stringent lockdown measures in automotive industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Factory shutdowns impacting automobile production","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive impact on aviation industry due to travel bans","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for new aircraft purchases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 causing a decline in international visitor arrivals and tourism receipts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in global oil demand due to shutdown of international and domestic passenger aircraft","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe disruptions and delays in construction projects due to workforce unable to work as a result of stringent self-quarantine guidelines.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction sector leading to a drop in fixed asset investment and real estate development.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the food industry, including closure of restaurants, cafes, and luxury food service providers, and difficulty meeting rising demands due to panic buying.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators, icus, and ppe in hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive increase in network bandwidth consumption","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive drop in share prices of telecommunications companies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient number of testing kits leading to infeasibility of large-scale covid-19 testing.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to distinguish covid-19 symptoms from common flu, leading to challenges in determining testing criteria.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of large scale testing for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to accurate covid-19 tests","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False negative results in naat testing due to targeting a single gene","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of serological tests to detect early-stage infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in diagnosing past infections with naat and serological tests","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No definitive treatment or preventive vaccine for the coronavirus","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Treatment of covid-19 is mostly symptomatic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Patients with mild covid-19 symptoms managed at home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus mutation challenges vaccine development","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long timeline for commercial release of vaccines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential failure of vaccine efficacy in later clinical trials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate public trust in traditional vaccine development methods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
